Name: Effie
Description: "When Played, Heal all Damaged Allies by 1HP"

Name: Morag
Description: "When Played, Empower 1 Ally to the left 1HP/1Damage"

Name: Gregor
Description: "When Played, Restore 1 Ally to the right"

Name: Matthew
Description: "When Played, Weaken an Enemy Attacker by 2Damage"

Name: Lachlan
Description: "When Destroyed, Replace with a 2HP/2Damage Changeling"

Name: Arvil
Description: "When Destroyed, Draw Carwen to Hand provided they are in your Deck"

Name: Carwen
Description: "When Destroyed, Draw Arvil to Hand provided they are in your Deck"

Name: Bealin’ Donald
Description: "Zone across takes 2Damage, Zones adjacent take 1Damage"

Name: The Eachy
Description: "On attack, Decrease the attacked cards attack by 1Damage"

Name: Blue Men of the Minch
Description: "When played, Summons 2 Blue Men, if there are free zones"

Name: The Ceasg
Description: "When played, gives up to three Allies +1HP"

Name: The Cu-Sith
Description: "Howls, on end of player’s turn, -1HP and -1Damage to enemies that attacked."

Name: Phantom Piper
Description: "When played, turns one enemy unit to the Player’s side"

Name: Water Healing
Description: "Heal 1 Ally to the right for 1HP"

Name: Water Bubble
Description: "Enemy Unit in front Cannot Attack this Turn"

Name: Tidal Wave
Description: "Deal 2Damage to all Enemy Units. Heal all your Units by 2HP"

Name: Take Aim
Description: "Deals 2Damage to the Opponent"

Name: Targe
Description: "Strengthen an Ally on each side by 2HP"

Name: Perfect Date
Description: "Protects 1 Ally to the right from taking Damage for one turn"

Name: Conservation
Description: "Prevents 1 Ally to the left from taking Damage for one turn"

Name: Otter
Description: "Heal 1 Ally to the right for 1HP or, if the Boobrie is active, heal it for 2HP"
